name: Financial Tracker Notion Template [Limitless OS]
description: One of the many awesome mini-templates built into Limitless OS. Check out Limitless OS 3.0 in action:What you can do: Track your income & expenses Create and manage your accounts Transfer money between accounts Track your weekly/monthly/yearly recurring expenses Categorize your expenses Databases Inside: Accounts Income Expenses Transfers Recurring Expenses Expenses Categories Do you have questions?Send your feedback or queries to limitless@previewx.com
features: Track your income & expenses; Create and manage your accounts; Transfer money between accounts; Track your weekly/monthly/yearly recurring expenses; Categorize your expenses; Recurring Expenses
